name: core-styles
description: The definitive source of styling guidelines for grocery website features.
author: Greg Hemphill

scripts.css-NOTES: TODO: need to fix issue where css-lint errors because stylelint can't be found, yet it's installed.
scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/core-styles-defaults.scss dist/css/core-styles-defaults.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/docs/core-style-guide.scss assets/css/docs/core-style-guide.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/core-themes/_country-farm.scss dist/css/core-themes/country-farm.css
scripts.css-compile-DISABLED: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/core-styles.scss dist/css/core-styles.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/docs/core-style-guide.scss assets/css/docs/core-style-guide.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/core-themes/_country-farm.scss dist/css/core-themes/country-farm.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/core-styles-defaults.min.css dist/css/core-styles-defaults.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/core-themes/country-farm.min.css dist/css/core-themes/country-farm.css
scripts.dist: npm-run-all css icons js-move js-ahoy-move images-move
